title: Champion talihya
body: Hi guys i have been playing LOL for 7 months and in ebery rotation i did not the champion taliyha i have been wondeing has roit forgot about her viwers may think yhat the champion should be bought but she is so expensive amd i an gathering yhe ip for her but never seen her in he rotation

replies.body:
i thought tayliha was coming in this rotation 
i need to know why she did not come in this rotation

okk
 can wait for her  so i can play

It looks like something went a little wrong and Taliyah was [**never included in the champion rotations**](https://www.reddit.com/r/TaliyahMains/comments/6a95jr/free_champ_rotation/)!! We've gotten word on that reddit page that everything was fixed, and she should be joining the rotation before too long!
